title: Edric

Blaine Ogden is the strong and caring Alpha of the Cheyenne, Wyoming pack who is always concerned about the well-being of those around him. As these werewolves get to know Edric, they discover a dark secret from his past. Will this secret be the permanent undoing of their relationship? ** A Siren Erotic Romance
